row.process:
@echo off :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
! Cleaning trainling \ in service path if one has been specified by user : SET &UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_PATH_CLEANED#=&UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_PATH# : IF STR_FIND_REV(&UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_PATH#,'\')=STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_PATH#) : PRINT Triming trailing \ : SET &path_length#=STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_PATH#) : SET &path_length#=&path_length# - 1 : SET &UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_PATH_CLEANED#=STR_CUT(&UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_PATH#, 1, &path_length#) : ENDIF
! Check service already exists %SYSTEMROOT%\system32\sc.exe query "&UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_NAME#" | findstr "&UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_NAME#" if %errorlevel% EQU 0 ( echo &UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_NAME# already exists. Cannot create. exit /b 1 )
! Check given type is valid : IF &UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_TYPE# <> "own" OR "share" OR "kernel" OR "filesys" : PRINT "&UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_TYPE# is not valid. Select from either: own, share, kernel, filsys" : EXIT 1 : ENDIF
! Create the service %SYSTEMROOT%\system32\sc.exe create "&UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_NAME#" binPath= "&UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_PATH_CLEANED#" displayName= "&UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_DISPLAY_NAME#" type= "&UC4RB_SCM_SERVICE_TYPE#" if %errorlevel% NEQ 0 exit /b 1
